name: Poké Balls
description: A Poké Ball is a spherical device in the Pokémon games. It is used by Pokémon Trainers to catch wild Pokémon and store them in the player's inventory when not active. This art includes a row of different Poké Balls along with a (Shiny) Voltorb, a Pokémon that disguises itself as a Poké Ball.
